name: Lasya
description: It's Time to Dance o' clock! Forget the boredom of quarantine and show off your cool moves and grab your chance to be judged by Shekhar Master himself. Pravega '21 presents to you Lasya, your very own stage to show off your aesthetic. Donâ€™t keep these cool rewards waiting for too long, will ya'?

modules.heading: Eligibility
modules.content:
Open to all.
First 50 registrations will get free TIAAN products worth 50k! Hurry!

modules.heading: Submissions
modules.content: The process is simple enough: just pick a song of your choice (or from the list provided) and make a fiery dance-music video of minimum 90 seconds and send them to us at pravega.lasya@gmail.com.

links.text: Register here before submitting your entries

modules.heading: Prizes
modules.content: Cash prizes worth 26k + Social media shoutouts!
